job description:
XLFN Consulting provides large organizations with access to exceptional talent and job seekers with the opportunity to work on interesting projects at leading organizations.

We are looking for an analytics developer with strong skills in integration of complex and interactive visualizations/analytic solutions, cloud computing and data management.

No agencies or firms please. No C2C.

Remote work is available for this role.

Required Characteristics:
  • BS in Computer Science or equivalent field
  • Proficiency with Python, R, MySQL, and MS SQL
  • Working knowledge of Linux systems and relational databases
  • Experience with interactive visualization development using Python and R/Shiny
  • 5+ years of Cloud Experience (including Azure and Google Cloud)
  • 5+ years of experience integrating front and back-end technologies to create modern and secure interactive analytic tools and visualizations
  • Strong interpersonal, oral, and written communication skills
  • Ability to build and maintain relationships with customers and colleagues
Valued Characteristics:
  • Intellectually curious, passionate, and inventive
  • Experience with Shiny, Shiny Server, R-Studio Connect, Shiny Proxy, and / or PowerBI
  • Experience with Jenkins software development automation server
  • Experience building installation, configuration, administration, reporting of Atlassian tools Jira, Confluence, Bitbucket/Stash/GitHub
  • Experience with and willingness to support project management, Agile and documentation in Jira
  • MS/Ph.D in Computer Science or equivalent field from a high ranking university
Job Types: Full-time, Contract

Experience:
  • Python and / or R: 3 years (Preferred)
  • integrating front and back-end technologies: 5 years (Preferred)
  • Azure and Google Cloud: 5 years (Preferred)
  • interactive visualization development using Python & R/Shiny: 3 years (Preferred)
  • relational database: 3 years (Preferred)
Education:
  • Bachelor's (Required)
Work authorization:
  • United States (Required)
